phenix.refine: ALWAYS use actual filenames like PHASER.1.pdb and PHASER.1.mtz - NEVER use /path/to/ or /dev/null
First argument is PDB model, second is MTZ data: phenix.refine PHASER.1.pdb PHASER.1.mtz
Do NOT use ambiguous 'resolution=X' - use 'xray_data.high_resolution=X' instead
phenix.predict_and_build: NEVER use input_files.docked_model_file with a ligand file - this causes 'NoneType has no attribute get_hierarchy' error
For prediction only: input_files.seq_file=X.fa input_files.xray_data_file=X.mtz predict_and_build.stop_after_predict=True
phenix.phaser: CRITICAL: Phaser REQUIRES a PDB model file for molecular replacement
A sequence file (.fa) alone is NOT sufficient - it only provides composition
